name: ETHUSDRate
description: ETHUSDRate. ETH to USD rates storage. Rates passed to contract from the owner address.

eventDecorators.name: NewRate
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

functionDecorators.name: checkPrice
functionDecorators.description: Check correspondence USD cent to wei price historically up to two rates ago.

functionDecorators.name: getRateAt
functionDecorators.description: Get the ETH to USD rate at specific time.

parameterDecorators.name: time
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp the rate is actual to.

returnDecorators.description: An uint representing cent amount for 1 ETH to a specific period.

functionDecorators.name: setRate
functionDecorators.description: Set new ETH to USD rate.

parameterDecorators.name: rate
parameterDecorators.description: New rate value (1 ETH cost in cents).

functionDecorators.name: toWeiPrice
functionDecorators.description: Convert cent price to wei using current rate.

returnDecorators.description: An uint representing wei amount for supplied cent price.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
